parameters: Your village, your rules, I guess.
Ah, Autumn! It's good to see you! The birthday's going well,
They say that fountains bring good fortune! I'm trying to
harvest enough luck to find some fine honeys!
Oh, you'll see! They'll be lining up on my doorstep any
Hello Autumn! Strange to see you up before the old man but
I suppose there's a first for everything!
Yeah. That's the thing. He left me a note saying he's gone.
Know anything about where he might be?
Unfortunately, young Autumn, I have but no information to
Oh, hello dearie! I was told it was your birthday today.
Enjoy the feeling of having another year added to your
What's with that look? I'm only kidding!

and I'm trying to track him down! Do you have any leads that
Sorry, young lady, but my eyes and ears ain't what they
used to be. As much as I'd like to help you, I just don't
Good afternoon, Autumn! And happy birthday, too! I can't
believe it's been 21 years already that we've known you!
You know, you were barely a newborn when you first arrived
Good morning, Autumn. What can I do for you?
Pops is gone! he left me a note saying that he'd left the
village and I can't even imagine why!
That is incredibly uncharacteristic of him. Perhaps he's
just planning another birthday surprise for you, no? Well,
We were thinking of getting you something for your birthday!
I thought that you would like a new bow to replace your old
And I thought you'd like some more arrows! You could always

Yeah, that's... not how that works.
We can't just NOT tell her we'll try!
(They continue to bicker about whether it's better to be
blunt or reassuring. They'll be at it for a while.)
(They continue to bicker about whether it's better to be

Oh, good afternoon and happy birthday, Autumn.
I'm sorry that I don't have any food to give you this time.
But you remember how the last birthday went, right?
That batch was made for the whole village, silly!
Hey, Miss Janet, can I ask you for something?
If it's for some more of my cookies, I'm afraid I don't
have any ingredients to make another batch, I'm sorry!
No, no! This isn't cookie related. Not at all.
Have you seen Pops anywhere? I was hanging out with him
last night and now he's gone and I haven't seen him all
Oh, well, he's probably talking about the farmer's market.
Just by the mountain you can find a whole group of stalls
Maybe he's going to give one of the vendors a piece of his
mind. You know, I went there once and tried to buy baking
goods. It did not go well.
(Hm... I don't think that Pops would go back just to
argue with some stinky old vendor, but I can probably
get some info from the area.)
Thanks, Miss Janet! I'll leave you to your things, now.

Oh, heading out then? Well, good luck, Autumn! Augustus
wouldn't just disappear on us like that, you know better
Alright, so I'll go to the farmer's market to gather info.
There's tons of people there. They'll definitely know where
Hang on... is that girl... looking for Augustus...?

Listen, Augustus, you've got to come, quick! A mysterious
Alright, I'm here. What's all this about some new arrival?
Augustus, a mysterious person just walked through town
without saying a word and sat on the outlook!
You've got to check out the scene for us, please!
Yeah, we humble mountain townsfolk aren't used to such a
drastic and immediate change in the status quo!
My doctor said that unannounced change is bad for my heart!
Alright, I'll go see what their deal is.
They were just a traveler looking for some perspective.
See about providing them something to sustain them as they
It's not you. We just don't get many visitors up here, so
seeing someone new gave most of them quite a shock.
Living quarters are down this way.
It's all we have. Don't get picky now.
Now, wait here while I get something for you to eat.
Don't be too long. Might change my mind.
Sorry, I'm not good at jokes.
I should have something at the house.
I should have something at the house.
